facts.text: My long white fin is like a fancy flag! It trails behind me as I swim and can be longer than my body.
I'm one of the hardest fish to keep in an aquarium! I'm very picky about my food and get stressed easily.
I love to eat sponges! They're my favorite food, and I use my long snout to pick them out of tiny spaces.
I can dive really deep! I've been found swimming at depths of over 500 feet below the surface.
I usually travel with a partner or small group. We stick together as we swim around the reef.

profile.habitat: Coral reefs in the Indo-Pacific Ocean
